variable.name: MEDNUM
variable.comment: Medication number is used as a unique field identifier to allow submission of multiple medications for a single subject

variable.name: MSTART
variable.description: Medication start period relative to enrollment (days)
variable.comment: 'Gated field', defined as a data that will not be released to dbGaP until all subjects have been enrolled, and data is reviewed to confirm that there is no possibility of subject identification.

variable.name: DCMESTD
variable.comment: 'Gated field', defined as a data that will not be released to dbGaP until all subjects have been enrolled, and data is reviewed to confirm that there is no possibility of subject identification.
